# ApiPaymentRefundRequestDto

**Properties**

| Name        | Type   | Required | Description                        |
| :---------- | :----- | :------- | :--------------------------------- |
| id          | String | ❌       | Unique payment identifier in Asaas |
| value       | Double | ❌       | Amount to be refunded              |
| description | String | ❌       | Reason for the refund              |
